about_the_game:
The beauty Linda has been abducted by Mr. Strong AGAIN! For rescuing her, our Mess starts his new journey of pain…

However, when our Mess is being bulled by Mr. Strong, a new stronger enemy appears, and abducts her from Mr. Strong. How would Mess and Mr. Strong do to their common foe?

Mess Adventures 2 remains the style of nonsense, and keeps the same game experience as previous that would let all of you fiery guys show off your personalities, and give you the chance to purchase the new better mouse and keyboard. It is better to be recommend to any friends who are expected to be fooled, live broadcast, and even entertain yourself.

This game is currently available on Steam ONLY.

More miraculous converting

This game remains the 2D and 3D dimensions and the shifting of gravity, and also adds new bricks for converting to the horizontal version and the first-person pronoun. Let’s starts this unprecedented and wonderful journey in this scene that includes three different convertings!

More plentiful genres

Besides the mode of continuing adventures, a lot more new wonderful modes are added in this game. You wouldn’t miss this chance!

More painful traps

A lot more new traps hook-ups are added. If you are at the end of patience, it would be fine, and you are allowed to hit the handsome developer!

More nonsense puzzles

Many of puzzles seems nonsense but there are actually clues out there. When you think you can’t pass, try breaking the rules and do something unbelievable!

More weird rules

In the level of “Sokobans”, you still needs to redefine the rule and make a new one for getting pass. Beyond this, a lot more unexpected things are waiting for you!

More shocking death

There’re still many diverse and shocking ways of death.

More nice original music

The music in this game is still composed by producer YuZixi that would bring you guys a better game experience.

More custom achievements

There are three custom achievements. Show them to your friends and let them be in green with envy! First come first served! You wouldn't miss the chance! (btw, you don't need to climb up anymore...)


If you would like to see how that Mr Strong in “Mess Adventures” is beaten, do not hesitate and get yourself start! Which man will beautiful Linda chose?
detailed_description:
Mess Adventures


👆We highly recommend that you play the previous game before playing this game!👆


About the Game

The beauty Linda has been abducted by Mr. Strong AGAIN! For rescuing her, our Mess starts his new journey of pain…

However, when our Mess is being bulled by Mr. Strong, a new stronger enemy appears, and abducts her from Mr. Strong. How would Mess and Mr. Strong do to their common foe?

Mess Adventures 2 remains the style of nonsense, and keeps the same game experience as previous that would let all of you fiery guys show off your personalities, and give you the chance to purchase the new better mouse and keyboard. It is better to be recommend to any friends who are expected to be fooled, live broadcast, and even entertain yourself.

This game is currently available on Steam ONLY.

More miraculous converting

This game remains the 2D and 3D dimensions and the shifting of gravity, and also adds new bricks for converting to the horizontal version and the first-person pronoun. Let’s starts this unprecedented and wonderful journey in this scene that includes three different convertings!

More plentiful genres

Besides the mode of continuing adventures, a lot more new wonderful modes are added in this game. You wouldn’t miss this chance!

More painful traps

A lot more new traps hook-ups are added. If you are at the end of patience, it would be fine, and you are allowed to hit the handsome developer!

More nonsense puzzles

Many of puzzles seems nonsense but there are actually clues out there. When you think you can’t pass, try breaking the rules and do something unbelievable!

More weird rules

In the level of “Sokobans”, you still needs to redefine the rule and make a new one for getting pass. Beyond this, a lot more unexpected things are waiting for you!

More shocking death

There’re still many diverse and shocking ways of death.

More nice original music

The music in this game is still composed by producer YuZixi that would bring you guys a better game experience.

More custom achievements

There are three custom achievements. Show them to your friends and let them be in green with envy! First come first served! You wouldn't miss the chance! (btw, you don't need to climb up anymore...)


If you would like to see how that Mr Strong in “Mess Adventures” is beaten, do not hesitate and get yourself start! Which man will beautiful Linda chose?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12 or later
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 or later
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs or higher
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

name: Mess Adventures 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3+ Ghz or AMD Athlon64 3500+
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX660 TI
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel(i5/i7-series) or AMD (Phenom II series) 3.0 GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX950 or later
  • Sound Card: any

short_description: This abnormal game remains the previous nonsensical style, and it would be the best choice for teasing your friends, live broadcast, or even entertain yourself...
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
